problem_names: lemma SKIP_le: "SKIP {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>S'. c = SKIP {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')"
lemma Assign_le: "x ::= e {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>S'. c = x ::= e {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')"
lemma Seq_le: "c1;;c2 \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>c1' c2'. c = c1';;c2' \<and> c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2')"

lemma If_le: "IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2 {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow>
  (\<exists>c1' c2' S'. c= IF b THEN c1' ELSE c2' {S'} \<and> c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2' \<and> S \<le> S')"

lemma While_le: "{Inv} WHILE b DO c {P} \<le> w \<longleftrightarrow>
  (\<exists>Inv' c' P'. w = {Inv'} WHILE b DO c' {P'} \<and> c \<le> c' \<and> Inv \<le> Inv' \<and> P \<le> P')"
lemma le_post: "c \<le> d \<Longrightarrow> post c \<le> post d"
lemma mono2_step: "c1 \<le> c2 \<Longrightarrow> S1 \<subseteq> S2 \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c1 \<le> step S2 c2"
lemma strip_step: "strip(step S c) = strip c"
lemma lfp_cs_unfold: "lfp (step S) c = step S (lfp (step S) c)"
lemma CS_unfold: "CS c = step UNIV (CS c)"
translations: lemma SKIP_le: "SKIP {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>S'. c = SKIP {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (SKIP {S} \<le> c) = (\<exists>S'. c = SKIP {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')
by (cases c) auto
lemma Assign_le: "x ::= e {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>S'. c = x ::= e {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x ::= e {S} \<le> c) =
    (\<exists>S'. c = x ::= e {S'} \<and> S \<le> S')
by (cases c) auto
lemma Seq_le: "c1;;c2 \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>c1' c2'. c = c1';;c2' \<and> c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (c1;;
     c2 \<le> c) =
    (\<exists>c1' c2'. c = c1';;
                       c2' \<and>
                       c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2')
by (cases c) auto

lemma If_le: "IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2 {S} \<le> c \<longleftrightarrow>
  (\<exists>c1' c2' S'. c= IF b THEN c1' ELSE c2' {S'} \<and> c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2' \<and> S \<le> S')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2
     {S}
     \<le> c) =
    (\<exists>c1' c2' S'.
        c = IF b THEN c1' ELSE c2'
            {S'} \<and>
        c1 \<le> c1' \<and> c2 \<le> c2' \<and> S \<le> S')
by (cases c) auto

lemma While_le: "{Inv} WHILE b DO c {P} \<le> w \<longleftrightarrow>
  (\<exists>Inv' c' P'. w = {Inv'} WHILE b DO c' {P'} \<and> c \<le> c' \<and> Inv \<le> Inv' \<and> P \<le> P')"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ({Inv}
     WHILE b DO c
     {P}
     \<le> w) =
    (\<exists>Inv' c' P'.
        w = {Inv'}
            WHILE b DO c'
            {P'} \<and>
        c \<le> c' \<and> Inv \<le> Inv' \<and> P \<le> P')
by (cases w) auto

definition less_acom :: "'a acom \<Rightarrow> 'a acom \<Rightarrow> bool" where
"less_acom x y = (x \<le> y \<and> \<not> y \<le> x)"
instance

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. OFCLASS('a acom, order_class)
proof (standard,goal_cases)

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x y. (x < y) = (x \<le> y \<and> \<not> y \<le> x)
 2. \<And>x. x \<le> x
 3. \<And>x y z.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> z\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x \<le> z
 4. \<And>x y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> x = y
case 1

fun sub\<^sub>1 :: "'a acom \<Rightarrow> 'a acom" where
"sub\<^sub>1(c1;;c2) = c1" |
"sub\<^sub>1(IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2 {S}) = c1" |
"sub\<^sub>1({I} WHILE b DO c {P}) = c"

fun sub\<^sub>2 :: "'a acom \<Rightarrow> 'a acom" where
"sub\<^sub>2(c1;;c2) = c2" |
"sub\<^sub>2(IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2 {S}) = c2"

fun invar :: "'a acom \<Rightarrow> 'a" where
"invar({I} WHILE b DO c {P}) = I"

fun lift :: "('a set \<Rightarrow> 'b) \<Rightarrow> com \<Rightarrow> 'a acom set \<Rightarrow> 'b acom"
where
"lift F com.SKIP M = (SKIP {F (post ` M)})" |
"lift F (x ::= a) M = (x ::= a {F (post ` M)})" |
"lift F (c1;;c2) M =
  lift F c1 (sub\<^sub>1 ` M);; lift F c2 (sub\<^sub>2 ` M)" |
"lift F (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2) M =
  IF b THEN lift F c1 (sub\<^sub>1 ` M) ELSE lift F c2 (sub\<^sub>2 ` M)
  {F (post ` M)}" |
"lift F (WHILE b DO c) M =
 {F (invar ` M)}
 WHILE b DO lift F c (sub\<^sub>1 ` M)
 {F (post ` M)}"
global_interpretation Complete_Lattice_ix "%c. {c'. strip c' = c}" "lift Inter"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Complete_Lattice_ix (\<lambda>c. {c'. strip c' = c}) (lift \<Inter>)
proof (standard,goal_cases)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A i a.
       \<lbrakk>A \<subseteq> {c'. strip c' = i}; a \<in> A\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> lift \<Inter> i A \<le> a
 2. \<And>b i A.
       \<lbrakk>b \<in> {c'. strip c' = i};
        \<forall>a\<in>A. b \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b \<le> lift \<Inter> i A
 3. \<And>A i.
       A \<subseteq> {c'. strip c' = i} \<Longrightarrow>
       lift \<Inter> i A \<in> {c'. strip c' = i}
case (1 A _ a)

proof (state)
this:
  A \<subseteq> {c'. strip c' = i_}
  a \<in> A

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A i a.

 2. \<And>b i A.
       \<lbrakk>b \<in> {c'. strip c' = i};
        \<forall>a\<in>A. b \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> b \<le> lift \<Inter> i A
 3. \<And>A i.
       A \<subseteq> {c'. strip c' = i} \<Longrightarrow>
       lift \<Inter> i A \<in> {c'. strip c' = i}

have "strip(lift Inter i A) = i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. strip (lift \<Inter> i A) = i
proof(induction i arbitrary: A)

proof (state)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> com.SKIP A) = com.SKIP
 2. \<And>x1 x2 A. strip (lift \<Inter> (x1 ::= x2) A) = x1 ::= x2
 3. \<And>i1 i2 A.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> i1 A) = i1;
        \<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> i2 A) = i2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> strip (lift \<Inter> (i1;; i2) A) = i1;; i2
 4. \<And>x1 i1 i2 A.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> i1 A) = i1;
        \<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> i2 A) = i2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> strip (lift \<Inter> (IF x1 THEN i1 ELSE i2) A) =
                         IF x1 THEN i1 ELSE i2
 5. \<And>x1 i A.
       (\<And>A. strip (lift \<Inter> i A) = i) \<Longrightarrow>
       strip (lift \<Inter> (WHILE x1 DO i) A) = WHILE x1 DO i

       lift \<Inter> i A \<in> {c'. strip c' = i}
thus ?case
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  lift \<Inter> i A \<in> {c'. strip c' = i}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma le_post: "c \<le> d \<Longrightarrow> post c \<le> post d"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. c \<le> d \<Longrightarrow> post c \<le> post d
by(induction c d rule: less_eq_acom.induct) auto
subsection "Collecting semantics"

fun step :: "state set \<Rightarrow> state set acom \<Rightarrow> state set acom" where
"step S (SKIP {P}) = (SKIP {S})" |
"step S (x ::= e {P}) =
  (x ::= e {{s'. \<exists>s\<in>S. s' = s(x := aval e s)}})" |
"step S (c1;; c2) = step S c1;; step (post c1) c2" |
"step S (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2 {P}) =
   IF b THEN step {s:S. bval b s} c1 ELSE step {s:S. \<not> bval b s} c2
   {post c1 \<union> post c2}" |
"step S ({Inv} WHILE b DO c {P}) =
  {S \<union> post c} WHILE b DO (step {s:Inv. bval b s} c) {{s:Inv. \<not> bval b s}}"

definition CS :: "com \<Rightarrow> state set acom" where
"CS c = lfp (step UNIV) c"
lemma mono2_step: "c1 \<le> c2 \<Longrightarrow> S1 \<subseteq> S2 \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c1 \<le> step S2 c2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>c1 \<le> c2; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c1 \<le> step S2 c2
proof(induction c1 c2 arbitrary: S1 S2 rule: less_eq_acom.induct)
case 2
thus ?case
by fastforce
next
case 3
thus ?case
by(simp add: le_post)
next
case 4

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>c1_ \<le> c1'_; ?S1.0 \<subseteq> ?S2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> step ?S1.0 c1_ \<le> step ?S2.0 c1'_
  \<lbrakk>c2_ \<le> c2'_; ?S1.0 \<subseteq> ?S2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> step ?S1.0 c2_ \<le> step ?S2.0 c2'_
  IF b_ THEN c1_ ELSE c2_
  {S_}
  \<le> IF b'_ THEN c1'_ ELSE c2'_
        {S'_}
  S1 \<subseteq> S2

goal (35 subgoals):
 1. \<And>S S' S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>SKIP {S} \<le> SKIP {S'}; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (SKIP {S}) \<le> step S2 (SKIP {S'})
 2. \<And>b c1 c2 S b' c1' c2' S' S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>S1 S2.
                   \<lbrakk>c1 \<le> c1'; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c1 \<le> step S2 c1';
        \<And>S1 S2.
           \<lbrakk>c2 \<le> c2'; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c2 \<le> step S2 c2';
        IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2
        {S}
        \<le> IF b' THEN c1' ELSE c2'
              {S'};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (IF b THEN c1 ELSE c2
                                  {S})
                         \<le> step S2 (IF b' THEN c1' ELSE c2'
  {S'})
 3. \<And>Inv b c P Inv' b' c' P' S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>S1 S2.
                   \<lbrakk>c \<le> c'; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> step S1 c \<le> step S2 c';
        {Inv}
        WHILE b DO c
        {P}
        \<le> {Inv'}
              WHILE b' DO c'
              {P'};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 ({Inv}
                                  WHILE b DO c
                                  {P})
                         \<le> step S2 ({Inv'}
  WHILE b' DO c'
  {P'})
 4. \<And>v va vb vc S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v ::= va {vb} \<le> SKIP {vc}; S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v ::= va {vb}) \<le> step S2 (SKIP {vc})
 5. \<And>v va vb vc vd S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v ::= va {vb} \<le> vc;;
                vd;
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v ::= va {vb}) \<le> step S2 (vc;;
                          vd)
 6. \<And>v va vb vc vd ve vf S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v ::= va {vb} \<le> IF vc THEN vd ELSE ve
                                    {vf};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v ::= va {vb})
                         \<le> step S2 (IF vc THEN vd ELSE ve
  {vf})
 7. \<And>v va vb vc vd ve vf S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v ::= va {vb} \<le> {vc}
                                    WHILE vd DO ve
                                    {vf};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v ::= va {vb})
                         \<le> step S2 ({vc}
  WHILE vd DO ve
  {vf})
 8. \<And>v va vb S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v;;
                va \<le> SKIP {vb};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v;;
                                  va)
                         \<le> step S2 (SKIP {vb})
 9. \<And>v va vb vc vd S1 S2.
       \<lbrakk>v;;
                va \<le> vb ::= vc {vd};
        S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v;;
                                  va)
                         \<le> step S2 (vb ::= vc {vd})
 10. \<And>v va vb vc vd ve S1 S2.
        \<lbrakk>v;;
                 va \<le> IF vb THEN vc ELSE vd
                          {ve};
         S1 \<subseteq> S2\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> step S1 (v;;
                                   va)
                          \<le> step S2 (IF vb THEN vc ELSE vd
   {ve})
A total of 35 subgoals...
thus ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>c1_ \<le> c1'_; ?S1.0 \<subseteq> ?S2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> step ?S1.0 c1_ \<le> step ?S2.0 c1'_
  \<lbrakk>c2_ \<le> c2'_; ?S1.0 \<subseteq> ?S2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> step ?S1.0 c2_ \<le> step ?S2.0 c2'_
  IF b_ THEN c1_ ELSE c2_
  {S_}
  \<le> IF b'_ THEN c1'_ ELSE c2'_
        {S'_}
  S1 \<subseteq> S2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. step S1 (IF b_ THEN c1_ ELSE c2_
             {S_})
    \<le> step S2 (IF b'_ THEN c1'_ ELSE c2'_
                   {S'_})
by(simp add: subset_iff)(metis le_post subsetD)+
next
case 5
thus ?case
by(simp add: subset_iff) (metis le_post subsetD)
qed auto
lemma mono_step: "mono (step S)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mono (step S)
by(blast intro: monoI mono2_step)
lemma strip_step: "strip(step S c) = strip c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. strip (step S c) = strip c
by (induction c arbitrary: S) auto
lemma lfp_cs_unfold: "lfp (step S) c = step S (lfp (step S) c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Collecting.lfp (step S) c = step S (Collecting.lfp (step S) c)
apply(rule lfp_unfold[OF _  mono_step])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x i.
       (step S x \<in> {c'. strip c' = i}) = (x \<in> {c'. strip c' = i})
apply(simp add: strip_step)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
lemma CS_unfold: "CS c = step UNIV (CS c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. CS c = step UNIV (CS c)
by (metis CS_def lfp_cs_unfold)
lemma strip_CS[simp]: "strip(CS c) = c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. strip (CS c) = c
by(simp add: CS_def index_lfp[simplified])
end
